scripts.prebuildLayer: cd lambdaLayerStack && npm i && cd .. && npm run moveLibsToLayer
scripts.deploy: npm run buildLayer && sam package --template-file ./root-template.yaml --s3-bucket <Bucket_name> --output-template-file packaged.yaml --region <REGION>
scripts.postdeploy: sam deploy --template-file ./packaged.yaml --region <REGION> --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND --stack-name ttAppStack --s3-bucket <Bucket_name> --parameter-overrides stageName=prod
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run buildLayer && sam package --template-file ./root-template.yaml --s3-bucket ttapp-dev --output-template-file packaged.yaml --region ap-south-1 --profile nevinedwin
scripts.postdeploy-dev: sam deploy --template-file ./packaged.yaml --region ap-south-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND --stack-name ttApp-stack-dev --s3-bucket ttapp-dev --parameter-overrides stageName=dev --no-confirm-changeset --profile nevinedwin
scripts.deploy-local: npm run buildLayer && sam package --template-file ./root-template.yaml --s3-bucket ttapp-dev --output-template-file packaged.yaml --region ap-south-1 --profile nevinedwin
scripts.postdeploy-local: sam deploy --template-file ./packaged.yaml --region ap-south-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND --stack-name ttApp-stack-local --s3-bucket ttapp-dev --parameter-overrides stageName=local --no-confirm-changeset --profile nevinedwin
scripts.delete-local: aws cloudformation delete-stack --stack-name ttApp-stack-local --profile nevinedwin --region ap-south-1
